@WinkyEmoticon If you recall, the correction I was asking for was about terrorism rates reflated to refugees.
@WinkyEmoticon Wouldn't it be good to provide the data that says that it's 1) unprecedented and 2) the result of an immigration crisis?
@WinkyEmoticon I distinguish terrorism trends from sexual assault. I don't downplay it. I also try to look for data to see if trend matches
@WinkyEmoticon Show me where I ever try to deny a New Years rape event! Not what I'm doing.
@WinkyEmoticon Look, you need DATA on these things! We don't do thought experiments on rape statistics. I'm looking first.
@WinkyEmoticon looking at DATA now. that's what you are supposed do. You provide none, so i have to hunt. Thanks.
@WinkyEmoticon Now you're conflating Muslim immigration with refugees. Data on refugee TERROR says you're wrong. Looking for rape stats now
@WinkyEmoticon is is why you need to clean up your claim- conflating sexual assault with terrorist attacks (both without data) is bad.
@WinkyEmoticon Go through your list of terrorism incidents. Show me the refugees. I'll compare with Global Terrorism Database.
@WinkyEmoticon Your continued "point" across tweets was that "stats" say refugees increase terror. You don't provide a cite, but cite these.
@WinkyEmoticon Your use of "terorrism AND sexual assault" might need cleaned up here. Let's combat sexual assault- I'm for that.
